attributes.action: Stop reclaiming  board and lodgings from the compensation of victims of miscarriage of justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We don't charge guilty people for their stay in prison we should stop being petty in taking back a percentage of these victims compensation to cover the living expenses they would have incurred if they had not been in prison

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
